meaningMnemonic: When a bunch of <radical>thread</radical>s are <radical>meeting</radical> on paper (after you've dipped them in paint, say) they can create a masterpiece of a <kanji>picture</kanji> (or <kanji>painting</kanji>).
readingMnemonic: You tell someone you painted this masterpiece of a <kanji>picture</kanji>. Their response? "<reading>EH</reading>?!" (え)
